title: internal compiler error: defercheckwidth
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
package main

var _ = func() {
	type S int
}


2. What is the full compiler output?
x.go:4: internal compiler error: defercheckwidth


3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
6g version weekly.2011-07-07 9023+
